TemporalDirections.TEXT: 259,PAMELA,"(shakes Jerry's hand) Yes, we met.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 260,JERRY,"Hi, happy birthday.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 261,PAMELA,"Thanks, ah, everybody, this is Elaine and Jerry.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 262,"GUESTS, JERRY & ELAINE",Hi,1.0,S01E01,1.0 263,JERRY,I didnt bring anything.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 264,PAMELA,"Uh, I put you two right here.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 265,JERRY,"Oh, Okay (turns to rest of table) Im sorry, I didnt know what to bring, nobody told me.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 266,VANESSA,How big a tip do you think itd take to get him to stop?,1.0,S01E01,1.0 267,JERRY,Im in for five...,1.0,S01E01,1.0 268,VANESSA,Ill supply the hat.,1.0,S01E01,1.0

DIALOGUE.text: Im sorry, I didnt know what to bring, nobody told me
